result.arabic_text: وَٱسۡتَعِينُواْ بِٱلصَّبۡرِ وَٱلصَّلَوٰةِۚ وَإِنَّهَا لَكَبِيرَةٌ إِلَّا عَلَى ٱلۡخَٰشِعِينَ
result.translation: Bemeramana! Mu gutunganya ivyanyu, nimwifashishe kwihangana mu gukora ivyo mwategetswe no mu kwirinda ivyo mwabujijwe, mwongere mwifashishe no gusenga isengesho rikwije ibisabwa ku mwanya waryo n’aho bigoye cane kiretse ku bantu bitonesha bakicisha bugufi ku Mana Allah;
